name: Dr. Snail
description:
Created for My First Game Jam: Summer 2022 with the theme of ✨Heal✨, Dr. Snail was a fun learning experience for me as a developer as well as hopefully a fun little game to try out.

The objective is relatively simple: Stitch as many 'wounds' as possible as Dr. Snail by touching them.

Controls are also relatively simple, using the WASD keys to select directions and continuously move in a manner similar to that of the game Snake. Press [SPACE] while playing to move to a different 'patient' with a different set of wounds, and press [ESC] at any time to return to the home menu.

Thanks for downloading and taking the time to check out this little project!
